original: Forsblad, Olof Vilhelm, konsul, Göteborg, f. 22/3/82 i Gbg av dir. J. A. F. o. Gerda Berglund. G. m. Elsa Abrahamsson. Barn: Gerd f. 11, g. m. Bror Polheimer, Gbg, Brita 16, g. m. mantalsassist. Gunnar Vangen, Gbg, Märta 17, g. m. intend. Gunnar Flog-ner, Hofors Bruk, Kerstin 19, Röda kors-syster, Gbg, Inger 25, stud. — Stud:ex. v. Gbgs real 01, Gbgs hand:inst. fackkurs f. stud. 01-02. Föret, flera res. i Europa. Anst. i A-B Gbgs Bank 02, Hand:- o. Fabr. A-B Aug. Werner & Co. 03, Amer. Cotton Co. o. sped:firma H. Morisse & Fils i Le Havre 03-04, Galbraith Hill & Co. i London 04-05, inneh. sped:firma Forsblad & Son i Gbg sed. 16. Ecuadors konsul i Gbg 16-35. Ordf. i Gbgs köpm. arb :giv :förb. o. Gbgs sped:-fören., v. ordf. i styr. f. Sv. sped:-fören. riksförb., styr :led. i Nord. sped:förb., styr :led. f. Sv:e i Internat. Federation der Sped :org., led. av styr. f. Gbgs konstfören. o. Riksorg. f. Sv. filatelistfören, ordf. i Sv. filatelistför-en. i Gbg. Medl. av Frimurarorden o. Göta Par Bricole. Redigerar Nord. Sped:förb. Tddskr. Hobbies: konst, konsthantv. o. filateli.
translated: Forsblad, Olof Vilhelm, consul, Gothenburg, born March 22, 1882 in Gothenburg to director J.A.F. and Gerda Berglund. Married to Elsa Abrahamsson. Children: Gerd, born 1911, married to Bror Polheimer, Gothenburg; Brita, born 1916, married to tax clerk Gunnar Vangen, Gothenburg; Märta, born 1917, married to mining engineer Gunnar Flogner, Hofors Bruk; Kerstin, born 1919, Red Cross nurse, Gothenburg; Inger, born 1925, student. Graduated from Gothenburg Real School in 1901, Gothenburg Business Institute trade course for students 1901-1902. Several trips to Europe. Employed by AB Gothenburg Bank in 1902, Aug. Werner & Co. Manufacturing and Trading Company in 1903, American Cotton Co. and shipping firm H. Morisse & Fils in Le Havre from 1903-1904, Galbraith Hill & Co. in London from 1904-1905, owner of shipping firm Forsblad & Son in Gothenburg since 1916. Consul of Ecuador in Gothenburg from 1916-1935. Chairman of the Gothenburg Merchant Employers' Federation and the Gothenburg Shipping Association, vice chairman of the board for the Swedish National Association of Freight Forwarders, board member of the Nordic Association of Freight Forwarders, board member of the Swedish branch of the International Federation of Freight Forwarders, board member of the Gothenburg Art Association and the National Organization for Swedish philatelic associations, chairman of the Swedish philatelic society in Gothenburg. Member of the Freemasons and Göta Par Bricole. Edits the Nordic Association of Freight Forwarders' magazine. Hobbies: art, arts and crafts, and philately.
